class_notes: This course is cross-listed with NRSG 540MN section 300. The Office of Education will process the registration.
course_description: This course provides clinical practicum for the theory courses: Mental Health Nursing. Students will extend critical thinking and clinical judgment to meet the physical, psychosocial, cultural and spiritual needs of clients and families in the clinical areas.
sections: Class Nbr: This section is full 2253, Section #: 100, Type: CLN, Campus: ATL, Meets: Does Not Meet, Instructor: M. Goodson, Status: Closed
